Summary: my wife,brother, and i were outside on our front porch when my watching the sky at aprox 8:05PM when my wife spotted it in the NW sky
divs: Sighting Detailson june-04-13 at 8:05pm my wife brother and i were out watching the sky on our back porch when my wife said jokingly "hey look a ufo" we turned to the NW sky and saw a very bright orb flying at high speed. at first we all thought it was a plane from the some what near sky harbor airport, but then we noticed an actual plane flying underneath it and behind and could tell right away it was not a plane. the planes where flashing three different colors of lights in a sequence (blue,red,white)the ord on the other hand was just a very very bright white with a soft blue center and flew in a snake like pattern we watched for about 5 min until the orb turned west and dropped suddenly behind the mountains wish i had my camera with me to give you more evidence but this definitely was not a normal flying apparatus.
